revised_title: The Effect of Malachite-Green on the Physiological Activity and Morphology of Bacillus coli
tldr: The author investigates the impact of malachite-green on the physiological activity and morphology of Bacillus coli. They find that the dye causes a profound change in the organism, altering its ability to produce gas in certain sugars and polyhydric alcohols, and inducing the formation of long filaments and slime production.
